meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice, (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)
실용회화-반대 Your intentions are good, but …
Strangers when a good thing happens, and relatives when a bad thing happens

vlive.korean: [#물이 좋지만...] [물을 좋아하고] 물 진짜 깨끗해요! [#Even though she loves water] [I love water] The water is so clean! 듣기 View video TWICE : 나연 TV “나연이 하와이 갔나연? (Feat. 코스모폴리탄 3월호)” EP.03
vlive.english: [#Even though she loves water] [I love water] The water is so clean!

저만 바라보고 있는 것도 좋지만 그래도 또... It's nice to look at me only. But... 듣기 View video OUI ENTERTAINMENT : [#YO_LIVE]요한이를 바라봄🌼

vlive.english: And you don't have to have that many friends.

examples.korean: He’s intelligent enough but he lacks motivation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 머리는 아주 좋지만 동기가 부족하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s intelligent enough but he lacks motivation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The house is in a bad state of repair but it has possibilities. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 집이 수리 상태가 안 좋지만 가능성은 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house is in a bad state of repair but it has possibilities. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The job is great in terms of salary, but it has its disadvantages. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 직장이 급여 면에서는 아주 좋지만 그 나름의 단점들도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The job is great in terms of salary, but it has its disadvantages. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Edamame are healthy, but relatively unknown. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 에다마메는 건강에 좋지만 비교적 덜 알려져 있다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전

examples.korean: The benefits are awesome and the pay is pretty good, but I don’t wanna work like a dog for the rest of my life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 혜택도 좋고 급여도 꽤 좋지만, 남은 내 인생 동안 개처럼 일하고 싶지 않아. DARAKWON
examples.english: The benefits are awesome and the pay is pretty good, but I don’t wanna work like a dog for the rest of my life. Add to Wordbook
